description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (plans) of planning permission ref: 244064HH dated 07/01/2025 for: Formation of vehicle crossover and installation of dropped kerb with associated landscape, alterations to front garden.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): EL24 01 - (Location Plan); EL24 88 A SITE PLAN 100 (Site Plan); EL24 88B (Proposed Site Plan); EL24 87- (Existing Site Plan); (Design and Access Statement (Dec 2024)).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
